title: Certified Compilation based on Gödel Numbers
summary: In his 1984 Turing Award lecture, Ken Thompson showed that a compiler could be maliciously altered to insert backdoors into programs it compiles and perpetuate this behavior by modifying any compiler it subsequently builds. Thompson's hack has been reproduced in real-world systems for demonstration purposes.
